title: Drive Plus - The challenges of Lightning Lap - AFTER_DRIVE.mp4
description:
Native 720p YT rip.  No 1080 it seems for this one....again. 

Also available on DailyMotion, Sockshare, and Videoweed.

Soon to be seedboxed.

=========================

Published on Sep 27, 2014
Want to set a hot lap in a Ferrari F12? How about a Viper? How about a Fiesta ST, or a cop car? Every year, Car and Driver brings a bunch of the best driver's cars of the year to Virginia International Raceway, and drives the hell out of them for several days, with the sole goal of driving as fast as possible. 

They call it "Lightning Lap."

On this episode, Mike is joined by Senior Editor Tony Quiroga, to talk about the cars that were easy, difficult, and disappointing.
